scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next dev
scripts.build:local: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=local node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
scripts.build:stag: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
